name: aws-deploy-infrastructure
description: 共通認証・課金基盤インフラストラクチャ

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:portal" "npm run dev:lambda"
scripts.build: npm run build:lambda && npm run build:admin && npm run build:portal
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd lambda && npm install && cd ../frontend/admin && npm install && cd ../portal && npm install && cd ../../sdk && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:admin && npm run lint:portal && npm run lint:lambda
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build:admin && npm run build:portal && npm run sync:s3
scripts.sync:s3: aws s3 sync frontend/admin/out s3://miyabi-admin-console-dev --delete && aws s3 sync frontend/portal/out s3://miyabi-portal-dev --delete

author: AI Dreams Factory
